Detailed Description

Generalized hashtable.

Contains definitions and functions for gHashTable, a generalized hash table which archives, and searches objects by a string "key". This can also be used for memory management: if a free function is given to the table, that function will be called with any item removed from the table.

Function Documentation

bool gAddTableItem ( gHashTable *  table,
const char *  key,
void *  item 
)

Adds an item to a hash table.

Attempts to add the given item to the hash table. If the given key already exists the function will return false. Otherwise returns true. The string passed will be copied. The gHashTable will not free the string you pass to this function.

Parameters:
[in] table Table to add the item to.
[in] key String key to associate with the item
[in] item Actual item to be stored.
Returns:
true on success, false if the item already exists.

void * gFindTableItem ( gHashTable *  table,
const char *  key 
)

Searches a hash table for an item with a matching key.

Searches the hash table for the given key and returns a pointer to the associated item.

Parameters:
[in] table Hash table to search
[in] key Hash key to search for
Returns:
Associated object on success, NULL on fail.

void gFreeHashTable ( gHashTable *  table  ) 

Frees a hash table.

Frees the given hash table, calling the freeFunc for all objects in the table.

Parameters:
[in] table Hash table to free.

gHashTable * gNewHashTable ( unsigned  numChains,
void(*)(void *)  freeFunc,
bool  ignoreCase 
)

Creates a new hash table.

Creates a new gHashTable object with the given number of hash chains. If freeFunc is null, the code assumes the objects in the table should not be freed when they are removed or the table is freed.

Parameters:
[in] numChains Initian number of chains in the table.
[in] freeFunc Function used to free items when they are removed. Can be NULL.
[in] ignoreCase If true, the hash table will ignore case when storing/finding items.
Returns:
Newly created hash table or NULL on error.

bool gRehashTable ( gHashTable *  table,
unsigned int  numChains 
)

Changes the number of hash chains.

Resizes and re-hashes the given table to the specified number of chains.

Parameters:
[in] table Hash table to be rehashed
[in] numChains Number of chains the table should have.
Returns:
true on success, false on error.

bool gRemoveTableItem ( gHashTable *  table,
const char *  key 
)

Removes an item from a hash table.

Searches the hash table for the given key and removes it from the bin. If the table is set to free objects, it will be freed.

Parameters:
[in] table Table to remove the item from
[in] key The key of the item to be removed.
Returns:
True if the item was successfully removed, false if it could not be found.
